name: [Group1] W.A.S.P.S.
description:
W.A.S.P.S. is a 4-player couch co-op game where you’re dropped in a barren wasteland, left to your own devices to protect a payload against enemy robots while bringing it to an end zone, where more peril awaits…

    Each player takes control of a drone, using it’s full capabilities of shooting and blasting an EMP from the payload when it’s charged to defeat the laser-shooting robots dropping down from the sky. This cooperative adventure uses level branching and pick-up randomness to make sure no two rounds are the same. 

Will you be able to protect the payload and defeat the boss?
